_comments.salt_length: Bytes for the salt. More = spicier security! Stick with 32 unless you're feeling wild.
_comments.iv_length: Initialization vector size. 16 bytes is the sweet spot for AES.
_comments.key_length: AES key size. 32 bytes = AES-256, the superhero of encryption!
_comments.iterations: PBKDF2 loops to make your password tough as nails. 500000 is plenty.
_comments.output_dir: Where encrypted/decrypted files hang out. Default: secure_files.
_comments.temp_dir: Temporary hideout for files during processing. Default: .temp.
_comments.stego_dir: Stash for sneaky PNGs with hidden data. Default: secure_files/stego.
_comments.hash_algorithm: Hash for checking file integrity. sha256 is our trusty sidekick.
_comments.cleanup_temp: Wipe temp files after use? True = clean slate, False = keep the mess.
